summary: TAKATA RECALL  NOT ABOUT AN ACCIDENT. I RECEIVED A LETTER FROM MERCEDES BENZ DATED "JANUARY 2018" SAYING THAT "REMEDY PARTS ARE NOW AVAILABLE FOR YOUR VEHICLE" TO REPLACE THE DRIVER'S SIDE TAKATA AIRBAG.   BUT WHEN I CALLED MY DEALER (BERGLUND MERCEDES BENZ IN ROANOKE, VA, I WAS TOLD THEY CANNOT GET ENOUGH OF THEM FROM WHOEVER IS SUPPOSED TO SUPPLY THEM, AND THE SERVICE MANAGER COULD NOT SAY WHEN THEY WILL BE AVAILABLE.  I HAVE NOT HAD AN ACCIDENT, SO THE DATE THAT YOU REQUIRE, BELOW, IS NOT THE DATE OF AN ACCIDENT BUT IS THE DATE OF THE MOST RECENT TIME I WAS TOLD BY BERGLUND MERCEDES BENZ THAT THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PART THAT MERCEDES BENZ HAS NOTIFIED ME IS AVAILABLE.
